name: note
room_description: There is a note on the floor here.
look_description:
August 15, 1903

Dear Samuel,

That fight over dinner was horrible. I hope your wife is aware that her behavior as a host was appalling and ungracious. I've said it before and I'll say it again -- she knows. I think even my John is beginning to wonder. Our relationship has cooled significantly and sometimes I am frightened at the thought of a future in a loveless marriage. Things should not be this way.

Our weekly dinner gatherings are not enough. I am counting the hours until she is visiting her sister again. I miss you with every piece of my soul.

Don't you want me to be happy?

Sincerely yours,

Martha

touch.text: The letters feel stiff and old.

smell.text: The perfume smells like roses, a delightful break from the house's usual musty aroma.
